definition: ring/hoop/loop/(chain) link/classifier for scores in archery etc/to surround/to encircle/to hem in

sentences.english: Heterocycle is always pyrimidine or triazine.
sentences.chinese: 其中雜環部分常爲嘧啶環或均三嗪環。

sentences.english: The bases and pentoses of the common nucleotides are heterocyclic compounds.
sentences.chinese: 常見核苷酸中的鹼基和戊糖是雜環化合物。

sentences.english: The digested enzymes activate the cancer-causing HCAs.
sentences.chinese: 這些被消化的酶激活了致癌性雜環化合胺物質。

sentences.english: It is a heterocyclic compound that is found in small amounts in most proteins .
sentences.chinese: 它是雜環化合物，在多數蛋白質中都有少量存在。

sentences.english: Aim Synthesis of nitrogen heterocycle ferrocenesulfonyl amide was studied.
sentences.chinese: 目的研究氮雜環二茂鐵磺酰胺類化合物的合成。

sentences.english: Heterocyclic compounds which modulate cannabinoid receptors are presented.
sentences.chinese: 提供了調節大麻素受體的雜環化合物。

sentences.english: Daily intakes of HCAs, including PhIP, were also calculated.
sentences.chinese: 雜環胺的日常攝入，包括PhIP，也計算在內。

sentences.english: Melamine is a small polar triazine compound.
sentences.chinese: 三聚氰胺是一種三嗪類含氮雜環有機化合物。

sentences.english: In this paper, we studied two kinds of phosphorus heterocycle.
sentences.chinese: 本論文中，我們研究了兩類不同的含磷雜環化合物。

sentences.english: Vegetables do not form heterocyclic amines or any other carcinogens during cooking.
sentences.chinese: 蔬菜在烹飪過程中不會形成雜環胺或者其它致癌物。

sentences.english: Aim To study on synthesis and antibacterial activity evaluation of poly heterocycles.
sentences.chinese: 目的研究多雜環化合物的合成方法和抗菌活性。
僅含有氮雜原子的雜環化合物。

sentences.english: Cooking at a lower temperature will decrease the formation of HCAs.
sentences.chinese: 低溫燒烤能夠減少雜環胺化合物的形成。
僅含有氧雜原子的雜環化合物。

sentences.english: In this paper, the study on heterocyclic HCMV protease inhibitors was reported.
sentences.chinese: 對雜環類HCMV蛋白酶抑制劑進行研究。

sentences.english: This paper reviews the recent advance in heteroaromatic molecular tweezers involving multiple hydrogen-bonding sites.
sentences.chinese: 綜述了芳雜環類多重氫鍵分子鉗人工受體研究進展。
